info.name: New York Times - Marc's Dark Theme
info.description:
A Darker Theme For the NYTimes Website. Colors inspired by Discord.</br>
</br>
Includes nytimes.com and mobile.nytimes.com</br>
</br>
</br>
Like my themes? Leave a comment. </br>
Dont like my themes? Leave a comment and I'll try to improve it! (Try to leave the URL and give a brief description of whats wrong)
info.additionalInfo:
Update 09/12/2018
Made a few changes to the home page
Images should no longer start off white and fade in when they load. They'll start off dark, then fade in. 
Will tackle the live polls a little later. 

Update 09/01/2018
Tackled a bit more. Did not visit all areas of the site, so there's probably quite a bit left to do. But the main articles, and home page should be good now. ?

Update 08/28/2018
NYTimes updated their site and their layout/element names. Did a quick little update to get rid of all the white backgrounds on the main page, but will need some more TLC in the future. 
Hopefully this helps though. 
Thanks JonnyRedHed for the heads-up.

Update 05/22/18
- Changed background of "Interactive" pages, with minor edits to text color as well

Update 05/03/18
- Comments section should no longer be white. 
- NYTimes logo on login page
- Some buttons at the top left in the header while viewing an article, and search. 

Update 04/03/18 
- Inverted NYT loading icon for stories at top of page when reading a story.
- Change Border color of a number of line separators and boxes (On an Article page)
- Updated Carousal colors, and the numbers for the articles inside
- Updated Business Markets page. Was almost completely white. 
- Changed hover color of the sections under the title. Used to be white, now a grey color.
- Added suggestions from John McDole

Update 11/22/17
- Change background color of Right-Click menu, when a video is right clicked.

Update 11/21/17
- Fixed Black text for names of commenters
- Changed font color to white for video thumbnails with text overlayed on them. 
- Removed background from social media buttons at top right when reading an article (These buttons still need more work though, just too lazy to do it right now)

Update 10/26/17
- Fixed issue where some articles at the top were hidden
- Recolored (invert filter) some icons, including settings icon at top right, "Todays Paper" and "Video" next to the date and weather at the top, and "Home Deliveries" and "Digital Subscriptions" in the footer. 
- Hid a few NYTimes self promotions
- Updated some borders, including the top border that surrounds the language selection, and 

Update 09/08/17
- Recolored podcast audio player on homepage
- Recolored article titles on homepage
- Minor reorganization of CSS code. (very minor)

Updates: 
Fixed Arrows for carousal, recolored as many white separators as possible to a lighter grey, Colored News alert popup

data.title: Comments sections still have white backgrounds.
The odd article here and there still has white backgrounds
NYTimes is about to launch a new home page/website
NYTimes has now changed its style
A little white space creeping back in
Live Polls section on home page
